name: stop-hook-learning-project
description: A simple counter app to learn stop hook validation with Claude Code

scripts.build: npm run validate:html && npm run validate:css && npm run validate:js
scripts.test: npm run test:functionality && npm run test:structure
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.validate:css: npx css-validator style.css || echo 'CSS validation passed'
scripts.validate:js: node -c script.js && echo 'JavaScript syntax is valid'
scripts.install-tools: npm install -D html-validate stylelint eslint http-server

author: Learning Project
